description: Same meaning as 开衩 (kāi chà). 开叉裙 (kāi chā qún) means "slit skirt".

examples.chinese: 高腰+后开叉设计的裙子,走路无束缚
examples.translation: High-waisted skirt with a back slit design, no restriction when walking

examples.chinese: 这种开叉喇叭裤真的好显瘦显腿长
examples.translation: These slit flared trousers really make you look slim and make your legs look long
